mission_ready_transport: The patient is ready for transport. They will follow you to the medical station.

mission_mounted_horse: The patient has mounted your horse.

mission_delivered: Patient delivered successfully. You can now begin surgical procedures.

mission_closer_patient: You need to be closer to the patient to load them.

mission_patient_stable: All surgical procedures completed. The patient is stable and recovering.
fracture_fall_injury: The fall may have %s your %s! Seek immediate medical attention.
snake_bite_venomous: The snake bite may be venomous! Seek treatment immediately.
vitals_normalPulse: Strong, regular pulse. Patient appears stable.
vitals_elevatedPulse: Pulse slightly elevated. Patient may be in mild distress.
vitals_fastPulse: Rapid pulse detected. Patient shows signs of significant distress.
vitals_criticalPulse: Dangerously fast pulse. Patient in critical condition.
vitals_weakPulse: Weak, irregular pulse. Patient is barely clinging to life.
vitals_unconsciousPulse: Patient is unconscious. Weak, irregular pulse detected.
vitals_noPulse: Patient shows no signs of life. No pulse or breathing detected.

ui_tightenUntilStop: Tighten until bleeding stops - document application time
ui_riskLimbLoss: Risk of limb loss if left on too long - monitor closely
ui_wildWestMedical: Wild West medical tools and supplies
